query: How many albums does Shawty has? Please provide me an interesting information about obtained number.

api_list.api_description: An artist object
Get a mathematical property about a number

optional_parameters.name: fragment
optional_parameters.description: Add "?fragment=true" to return the fact as a sentence fragment that can be easily included as part of a larger sentence. This means that the first word is lowercase and ending punctuation is omitted. For trivia and math, a noun phrase is returned that can be used in a sentence like “We now have more users than [fact as fragment]!”.

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: Specify "true" to return result as JSON instead of plaintext.

api_list.api_description: Convert efficiently and quickly between more than 50 of the most used units with a simple and intuitive conversion tool. At the output, you will get an answer with the conversion of your measurement units.
This endpoint will calculate the BMI of an individual using the imperial measurement system.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: The weight of someone in pounds (lbs)

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of someone in inches (in)

relevant APIs: Convert from one unit of measure to another

query: When is Shawty's birthday? What interesting happened that day?

api_list.api_description: API Ninjas Celebrity API endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of the celebrity you wish to search. This field is case-insensitive.

optional_parameters.name: min_height
optional_parameters.description: Minimum height of celebrities in meters (e.g. **1.65**).

optional_parameters.name: min_net_worth
optional_parameters.description: Minimum net worth of celebrities.

optional_parameters.name: nationality
optional_parameters.description: Nationality of celebrities. Must be an ISO 3166 Alpha-2 country code (e.g. **US**).

optional_parameters.name: max_net_worth
optional_parameters.description: Maximum net worth of celebrities.

optional_parameters.name: max_height
optional_parameters.description: Maximum height of celebrities in meters (e.g. **1.80**).

api_list.api_description: Get a fact about a day of year

optional_parameters.name: fragment
optional_parameters.description: Add "?fragment=true" to return the fact as a sentence fragment that can be easily included as part of a larger sentence. This means that the first word is lowercase and ending punctuation is omitted. For trivia and math, a noun phrase is returned that can be used in a sentence like “We now have more users than [fact as fragment]!”.

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: Specify "true" to return result as JSON instead of plaintext.

optional_parameters.name: fragment
optional_parameters.description: Add "?fragment=true" to return the fact as a sentence fragment that can be easily included as part of a larger sentence. This means that the first word is lowercase and ending punctuation is omitted. For trivia and math, a noun phrase is returned that can be used in a sentence like “We now have more users than [fact as fragment]!”.

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: Specify "true" to return result as JSON instead of plaintext.
